VersionInfo.ReleaseNotes:
Additions: * Added support for custom `Duser.home` paths in the **Options → Configure Save Options** dialog for advanced users. (thanks to [u/the_vico](https://www.reddit.com/user/the_vico/)!) * Added an option to minimize the app to the system tray (**Options → Minimize to System Tray**). This option is enabled by default. (thanks to [u/Historical_Bus_8041](https://www.reddit.com/user/Historical_Bus_8041/)!) * Added an option called **View in Explorer** to the context (right-click) menu in the world selection page. * Added a safeguard to avoid deleting active worlds in the world deletion dialog. Changes: * Relocated the log directory to `C:\Users\Username\AppData\Local\PZSaveManager\Logs`.
This release is compatible with saves created by the previous version of Save Manager (`1.0.0`).
